pages.text:
Sound it out: hot, red, big, crack, drip

Know these: the, is, they, into

New words: magma, lava, erupt, crater
pages.image_prompt: Clean layout with three labeled rows on a light blue background. First row (phonetic): each word has a small icon—flame for 'hot', red ball for 'red', large rock for 'big', cracked earth for 'crack', droplet of orange for 'drip'. Second row (sight): stars next to each word. Third row (special): bubbling red rock for 'magma', flowing orange river for 'lava', volcano popping for 'erupt', bowl-shaped hole on mountain top for 'crater'., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Close-up of the base of a cartoon volcano. Steam rises from small cracks in the rocky side. The rocks glow slightly red inside the cracks. Warm colors dominate—orange, red, brown. The mood is exciting but not scary., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: Deep down, the magma is hot.
pages.image_prompt: Cross-section view showing inside the volcano. Bright red-orange magma bubbles deep below ground. The earth layers above are brown and gray. A little thermometer in the corner shows 'very hot!' with a red line at the top., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: Magma is very red and big.
pages.image_prompt: A giant blob of glowing magma pulsing slowly underground. It sparkles and ripples like thick syrup. Two cartoon eyes peek out playfully, giving it a friendly look. Background is dark with glowing edges., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Magma bubbling upward through a rocky tube. Small arrows show motion. Cracks form above as pressure builds. The magma smiles as it moves up. Colors shift from dark to bright orange., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

A loud 'CRACK!' in bold letters as a fissure opens in the volcano’s side. Rocks fly gently into the air like popcorn. Dust puffs out. The mood is energetic and surprising, not violent., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Two wide-eyed cartoon animals (a rabbit and a bird) peek from behind a tree. They point at a thin red line of lava dripping from a crack. The drip glows against the dark rock., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Thick red magma pushing through the crack, rising higher. Bubbles pop on the surface. The ground rumbles slightly—shown with wavy lines beneath the animals' feet., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Volcano shaking slightly, steam blasting from the top. Clouds swirl above. The animals cover their ears with big smiles. Text pops out with an exclamation mark in fiery colors., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: It goes BOOM into the sky!
pages.image_prompt: A joyful eruption! Lava fountains shoot high like fireworks. Globs of lava arc through the air. Stars and sparkles fill the sky. No destruction—just fun action. The animals cheer below., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Lava pouring down the volcano's side like syrup. It moves over rocks and around trees (which hop aside safely). The flow is bright orange-red with black crust forming on top., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Lava reaching the ocean with a sizzle and puff of steam. Water bubbles gently. Fish peek up curiously. White clouds of mist rise into the air. The lava cools into black rock at the edge., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: The top has a big crater.
pages.image_prompt: View from above showing the volcano’s flat top with a round bowl-shaped crater. Smoke curls lazily from the middle. Birds circle above. The crater looks like a big cookie cutter in the mountain., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Looking straight down into the crater. It goes far down with glowing spots at the bottom. A rope ladder dangles with a brave explorer (a squirrel) peering over the edge with a flashlight., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: They see the hot red rock.
pages.image_prompt: Inside the crater, glowing red rocks pulse with heat. Drips of fresh magma fall slowly from the walls. The squirrel holds a thermometer that reads 'TOASTY!', children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Nighttime scene. The volcano sits quiet under a starry sky. A tiny puff of smoke says 'maybe...'. The animals sleep in a tent nearby, dreaming of lava fountains., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Same volcano, now rumbling again. Eyes appear in the crater, winking. A sign says 'Back in action soon!' Sparks fly. The mood is happy anticipation., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Cutaway view showing magma bubbling upward once more. Arrows point up. Bubbles go 'blub blub'. Friendly faces form in the molten rock., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: It is a big red flow.
pages.image_prompt: Wide shot of lava flowing down the mountain in thick, glossy waves. It reflects the sunset. Butterflies flutter above the warm path. The flow spells 'FUN' in cooled rock., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: The volcano is cool and hot!
pages.image_prompt: The volcano wearing sunglasses, one side steaming (hot), the other side with snowflakes (cool). A sign says 'Best of both worlds!' Animals skate and sunbathe at once., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: Did you know? Magma is underground lava!
